ComicInfo.Summary: Seven's Reckoning Part 2 of 4 Concrete and Iron are No Match for Flesh and Bone: As she continues to help the Ohrdi'Nadar repair their ship, Seven becomes sympathetic to the plight of the Vesh, the worker class that is seemingly being exploited and who plan an uprising against the ruling class, the Kz'Ar.
ComicInfo.Tags: The Doctor,Tuvok,Chakotay,Kathryn Janeway,Harry Kim,Seven of Nine
